content.webTitle: Your pictures: share your photographs on the theme of 'new'

fields.headline: Your pictures: share your photographs on the theme of 'new'
fields.bodyText: We’re now running a regular weekly photography assignment in the Observer New Review and the next theme is ‘new.’ Share your photos of what new means to you – and tell us about your image in the description box. The closing date is 31 December at 10 am. We’ll publish our favourites in The New Review on 4 January and in a gallery on the Guardian site. You can share your ‘new’ pictures by clicking on the blue ‘Contribute’ button on this article. You can also use the GuardianWitness smartphone app or the new Guardian app and search for ‘GuardianWitness assignments’ – and if you add it to the homepage – you can keep up with all our assignments. We’ll feature the best in an online gallery. GuardianWitness is the home of user-generated content on the Guardian. Contribute your video, pictures and stories, and browse news, reviews and creations submitted by others. Posts will be reviewed prior to publication on GuardianWitness, and the best pieces will feature on the Guardian site.
